author: Suzannah Lyons
title: Coronavirus can survive on surfaces for hours. Which items in your home pose a risk?
description: Coronavirus prefers hard and smooth surfaces the research tells us, but the risk of bringing it into your home is still low say experts.
content:
Could infectious viral particles be on the parcel that just got delivered? Or the fruit your partner bought home from the supermarket? Or the crosswalk button you pushed out on your daily walk?
Many people are concerned about how the virus could spread, but … [+5618 chars]
